sections.heading: Definitions.Section 1-110a. - Pension revocation or reduction for public officials and state or municipal employees convicted of crimes related to state or municipal office
sections.text: Factors. Voluntary provision of information. Innocent spouse, dependents and beneficiaries. Notification to Attorney General.
